Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Longport in 1965...
Injured on 7/29/1967 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/1968 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 4/3/1970 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/28/1970 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/23/1971...
Had first career hit on 5/10/1971, off Frances Prunty (TRO)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1972, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1976...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/13/1977 to a 5-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against Minnesota on 7/25/1977, striking out 8...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1978, going 4-0, 1.64...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1978...
Injured on 6/1/1979 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Hit first career homerun on 8/27/1980, off Bill Lingle (TOL)...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1982, going 4-0, 0.62...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Released by Bay City on 6/9/1984...
